content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Bo Li from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Bo Li from China

content: Hello Bo Li, it is my pleasure to meet you. The apartment is quite cozy and has a lot of natural light. It is a great option for someone looking for a comfortable and functional living space. As for the rental price, I would be happy to discuss it with you. What is your budget for renting this apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: My budget is 350 Euros per month. Thank you for your help.
name: Bo Li from China

content: Thank you for sharing your budget with me. The apartment is 25 square meters, which is quite small, but it is well-maintained and in a good location. Given your budget of 350 Euros per month, I would be happy to offer you this apartment for a monthly rental price of 320 Euros. This price includes all utilities and maintenance costs. I believe this is a fair price for this apartment, given its location and size. Do you agree to this rental price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
Yes, I agree to the price of 320 Euros per month. Thank you for your help.
TERMINATE
name: Bo Li from China

content: Thank you for your business, Bo Li. I hope you enjoy your stay in Munich and find the apartment to your liking. If you have any questions or need assistance with anything else, please don't hesitate to reach out to me. Goodbye!
name: Heinrich Heine
